header_19.raw_response: Diet Coke falls somewhere in the middle of the zesty-bland spectrum. While it does have a unique and recognizable taste, it is not as intensely flavored as some other sodas or carbonated drinks. It has a subtle sweetness and a slight carbonation that gives it a light and refreshing taste. Compared to drinks that are extremely zesty, like certain energy drinks or fruit-infused sodas, Diet Coke is relatively mild. However, it still has enough character to stand out from plain water or other bland beverages. Therefore, I would place Diet Coke closer to the zesty side of the spectrum, but not all the way to 100.
